content: crochet snowflake #2 video tutorial right-handed https //youtu be/t0-j5kmasfc left-handed https //youtu be/hatjza8-qye materials needed †3 25mm us d-3 crochet hook #2 fine yarn scissors finished size- 5 inches stitches used chain- chain treble_crochet- triple crochet slip_stitch- slip_stitch double_crochet- double_crochet picot-3- chain 3 slip_stitch into first chain half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet single_crochet- single_crochet pattern begin with a sliding loop round 1- chain 5 counts as treble_crochet chain 1 *treble_crochet chain 1 in sliding loop repeat from * 10 more times join with slip_stitch to forth chain of chain 5 12 round 2- chain 3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet in next chain double_crochet in next double_crochet *chain 3 skip next chain double_crochet in next double_crochet double_crochet in next chain double_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from * 4 more times join with double_crochet to third chain of chain 3 18 round 3- chain 3 counts as double_crochet treble_crochet picot-3 three times slip_stitch into slip_stitch of first picot-3 treble_crochet double_crochet in space created by double_crochet half_double_crochet in next double_crochet single_crochet in next double_crochet half_double_crochet in next double_crochet * double_crochet treble_crochet picot-3 three times slip_stitch into slip_stitch of first picot-3 treble_crochet double_crochet in next chain-3 space half_double_crochet in next double_crochet single_crochet in next double_crochet half_double_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from * 4 more times join with a slip_stitch into third chain of chain 3 fasten_off leaving 6 weave in loose ends
